parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3dev

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current speech volume (set by [[fadeSpeech]])

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''speechVolume'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[speechVolume]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fadeSpeech]], [[musicVolume]], [[soundVolume]], [[radioVolume]], [[environmentVolume]], [[getAudioOptionVolumes]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
